title: Coal-based graphene derived from different coal ranks: exceptional sodium storage performance in sodium-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31587-31597
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05104A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lanhao Wang, Xiaodong Yu, Zhendong Jiang, Xusheng Li, Chuanxiang Zhang
In this work, coal-based reduced graphene oxide (CrGO) was prepared as an anode materials for SIBs by a modified Hummers-high temperature thermal reduction method with different ranks of coal (coal-based graphite, CG) as a precursor.
